option.label: Enable NJAGC
option.help: When checked, the game clock is displayed using TheLopez's NJAGC mod.

option.label: Display Era
option.help: When checked, the current era is displayed to the left of the research bar.

option.key: Show Reflect Era In Turn Color
option.label: Use Era-Related Colors
option.help: When checked, the game date and era are displayed using a color for each era.
